title: Drawing, Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar- Materials, 1935
title_raw: Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar- Materials
medium: Graphite and red pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Small stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVE./NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Upper left quadrant: TERRA COTTA; upper right quadrant (counter clockwise from left): LINE UP WITH/WALL, 5' - 3", RUN LINOLEUM UNDER/FUTURE BAR TO WALLS, 3' 1 1/2"; lower right quadrant (clockwise from left): TERRA COTTA/DOTS 4" IN/DIAMETER &/4" APART, LINE UP WITH/EDGE OF/DOOR SILL, ALL DIMENSIONS TO BE CHECKED/ON JOB, SCALE 1/2" = 1'0"; lower center: OFF WHITE; lower left quadrant (clockwise from left): OFF WHITE/DOTS 4" IN/DIAMETER AND/4" APART, LINE UP WITH EDGE/OF COLUMN, LINE UP WITH/EDGE OF/MARBLE TREAD, MARBLE SILL.
description:
Floor plan of bar in Jascha Heifetz apartment showing dimensions and materials. Upper right corner is rounded bar with floor surrounding bar done in linoleum. Terra cotta floor in upper portion of room. Dotted floor design (6 dots arranged in two rows) near lower left corner of room in off white. Floor at lower right corner of room is off white, and had floor decoration of four terra cotta dots in lower right corner (arranged in 2 rows). Marble sill at lower left corner, probably near stairs.



Scale: 1/2"=1'0

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar- Materials, 1935. Graphite and red pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. 
Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-249
